name: Enter products and remove them in the shopping cart

testSteps.description: Given the user is in the application https://www.linio.com.co/

rootCause.message: Could not instantiate new WebDriver instance of type class org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver (The path to the driver executable must be set by the webdriver.gecko.driver system property; for more information, see https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver. The latest version can be downloaded from https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases). See below for more details.

testSteps.description: When the user goes to the home category and searches for the required product
Then the system will display a message which will show that the product was added correctly <message>

And the user will remove the products from the cart and will see an empty cart message <noproducts>
| message | noproducts |
| Tu producto se agreg√≥ al carrito | NO TIENES PRODUCTOS EN TU CARRITO |
